name: starknet_simulateTransactions

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag, for the block referencing the state or call the transaction on.
params.name: block_id

#/components/schemas/FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits
#/components/schemas/FELT.title: Field element

#/components/schemas/BLOCK_TAG.description: A tag specifying a dynamic reference to a block
#/components/schemas/BLOCK_TAG.title: Block tag

schema.description: a sequence of transactions to simulate, running each transaction on the state resulting from applying all the previous ones

#/components/schemas/INVOKE_TXN_V0.description: invokes a specific function in the desired contract (not necessarily an account)

params.description: describes what parts of the transaction should be executed
params.name: simulation_flags

#/components/schemas/SIMULATION_FLAG.description: Flags that indicate how to simulate a given transaction. By default, the sequencer behavior is replicated locally (enough funds are expected to be in the account, and fee will be deducted from the balance before the simulation of the next transaction). To skip the fee charge, use the SKIP_FEE_CHARGE flag.

result.description: The execution trace and consuemd resources of the required transactions
result.name: simulated_transactions

#/components/schemas/NUM_AS_HEX.description: An integer number in hex format (0x...)
#/components/schemas/NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex

gas_consumed.description: The Ethereum gas cost of the transaction (see https://docs.starknet.io/docs/Fees/fee-mechanism for more info)
gas_consumed.title: Gas consumed

#/components/schemas/NUM_AS_HEX.description: An integer number in hex format (0x...)
#/components/schemas/NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex

gas_price.description: The gas price (in gwei) that was used in the cost estimation
gas_price.title: Gas price

#/components/schemas/NUM_AS_HEX.description: An integer number in hex format (0x...)
#/components/schemas/NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex

overall_fee.description: The estimated fee for the transaction (in gwei), product of gas_consumed and gas_price
overall_fee.title: Overall fee

oneOf.description: the execution trace of an invoke transaction
oneOf.name: INVOKE_TXN_TRACE

execute_invocation.description: the trace of the __execute__ call or constructor call, depending on the transaction type (none for declare transactions)

revert_reason.description: the revert reason for the failed execution
revert_reason.name: revert reason

summary: simulate a given sequence of transactions on the requested state, and generate the execution traces. If one of the transactions is reverted, raises CONTRACT_ERROR.
